verbose_text: As a targeted therapeutic strategy to solve this obstacle, poly (lactic-co-glycolic acid) (PLGA)-mediated rosiglitazone was reported to increase regulators of cholesterol efflux in bone marrow derived macrophages; however, in vivo effects regarding plaque size or composition were lacking XREF_BIBR.
evidence: acid) (PLGA)-mediated rosiglitazone was reported to increase regulators of cholesterol
